data.actual_result: Audit log becomes unresponsive and won’t load instantly
data.expected_result: Audit log should respond fine like it did with (TestFlight 8667)
data.short_description: Audit log becomes unresponsive on a iPhone 6 while checking audit log on a large server with many actions being made
data.steps_to_repro: - Be an owner or admin of a large server (60k+ example) - Have a a bot make many  actions (like changing channel topic a lot) - Go to server settings and tap audit log - Observe audit log becoming unresponsive
